# mopac <img src='man/figures/logo.png' align="right" height="139" />

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

mopac provides real & simulated datasets based on vehicular observations from Loop 1 (a.k.a "Mopac") in Austin, Tx.

## Installation

```r
devtools::install_github("sccmckenzie/mopac")
```
